name: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby
overview: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby is an audio book with activities and games for children of ages 3 to 7. The story which comes from a compilation of southern US folktales is completely visualized and narrated by famous movie star Danny Glover. The text can be displayed while it is pronounced for early readers to learn the words. Aside from the story itself there's also games to be played. Parents can select games of an appropriate age level for their children. The games teach the children visual discrimination, classification, positional concepts and more. The game is part of the Storybook Adventures series and features the exact same interface as the other titles in the series: a magic bookmark that turns into a wizard as your guide.
